about_the_game:
Dungeon Ward is a mix of classic grid-based dungeon crawler and fast-paced action RPG, offering intense real-time combat, strategic movement, and character progression. Developed by solo indie developer, Dungeon Ward reignites the thrill of 90s dungeon crawling with heart-pounding combat at its core.

Choose between three distinct classes

Warden: A sturdy melee fighter armed with both defensive and offensive abilities.
Ranger: Specializes in ranged combat but can also shapeshift into a werewolf for devastating close-quarters attacks.
Mage: A master of elemental magic, wielding fireballs, lightning, and other powerful spells.

Learn special skills and talents

Invest in skill trees and talent points to unlock powerful abilities and passives, customizing your character's build to fit your playstyle. Whether you prefer raw strength, deadly precision, or magical prowess, the choice is yours.

Fight Challenging Boss Fights

Face off against epic bosses, each featuring unique mechanics that demand strategy and quick reflexes. Timing, positioning, and mastery of your class will be key to success.

Find Epic Loot

Collect powerful loot as you progress through dungeons, with equipment and items that cater to your class and build.

Ready to dive into a fresh take on classic dungeon crawling?

Step into Dungeon Ward today, hone your skills, and conquer dangerous dungeons filled with deadly enemies. Can you survive the challenges and rise as a hero?

Add Dungeon Ward to your WISHLIST NOW and get ready for an epic adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or Radeon HD 7750 with a minimum of 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU @ 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
